scripts.say: As soon as the anti-submarine recons detect an enemy, it will alert us as to its position and continue to track its movements.
Phew... I'm glad we made preparations to deal with enemy submarines beforehand. I didn't actually expect the Sirens to suddenly field them in such large numbers...
It's really amazing how many different roles you can cover as an escort carrier. I wish I could have planes as well~
Even with all this mist, I'd like to be able to get a birds' eye view of things.
Well, if you want to operate seaplanes, that would be possible after being retrofitted into an aviation cruiser.
Marblehead, are you worried about Memphis?
Memphis is always working so hard, she barely gets any time back at home. This was supposed to be a vacation for her...
I was going to show her around to all the neat sightseeing spots around here, as well as the best places to kick back and relax on off-duty days...
But it looks like that won't be possible anymore... Ahaha...
I'm also worried about Baltimore and Enterprise.
We may not be sister ships, but as fellow compatriots of the same great union, I pray for their safety as if they were related to me.
That's why I want to work even harder... So I can protect your smile and stuff.
Woah, talk about a curveball! You always came across as the overly serious type. Didn't think you had an appetite for jokes like that as well~
Let's both do our best then.
That's right. Let's make sure everyone gets home safely!
